import React from"react";import Slider from"react-slick";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick.css";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css";import'./style.css';import img_1 from'../assets/img/img_1.jpg';import img_2 from'../assets/img/img_2.jpg';import img_3 from'../assets/img/img_3.jpg';import img_4 from'../assets/img/img_4.jpg';import img_5 from'../assets/img/img_5.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const images=[{id:1,src:img_1,alt:"Image 1",text:"Stable and farm equipment"},{id:2,src:img_2,alt:"Image 2",text:"Saddles and saddle accessories"},{id:3,src:img_3,alt:"Image 3",text:"Bridles and reins"},{id:4,src:img_4,alt:"Image 4",text:"Riding apparel and footwear"},{id:5,src:img_5,alt:"Image 5",text:"Horse blankets and grooming supplies"}];const Carousel=()=>{const settings={centerMode:true,centerPadding:"30px",slidesToShow:3,infinite:true,speed:500,autoplay:true,autoplaySpeed:2000,cssEase:"ease",focusOnSelect:true,arrows:false,responsive:[{breakpoint:1024,settings:{slidesToShow:2,centerPadding:"20px"}},{breakpoint:768,settings:{slidesToShow:1,centerPadding:"10px"}}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{...settings,children:images.map(image=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"carousel-slide relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image.src,alt:image.alt,className:"carousel-image w-full h-full object-cover rounded-lg  transition-transform duration-300 ease-in-out"// className="w-full h-full object-cover rounded-lg shadow-lg relative z-10"
}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 flex flex-col items-center p-4 bg-gradient-to-t from-black via-transparent to-transparent",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-white text-xl mb-2",children:image.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"px-4 py-2 bg-header font-semibold rounded",children:"Enquiry Now"})]})]},image.id))})});};export default Carousel;
